domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump I'm so glad closing the border & bombing Iranian  ships was on your to do list.

If you spent half as much time focusing on the Coronavirus, we could have mass testing & an actual cohesive plan by now. 
So happy to see you have your priorities straight. 
You dictate, not lead.
